Data.Title: HTB-2Million
Data.Author: Maxime Delobel
Data.ContentPreview: In 2Million, we decoded a JS invite code to access the site, exploited an API to escalate to admin, injected commands for a reverse shell, found admin credentials, and gained root.

Data.Title: HTB-Cap
Data.Author: Maxime Delobel
Data.ContentPreview: In Cap, we found a pcap file exposing FTP creds, logged in for user access, exploited Python’s cap_setuid to run a script as root, and obtained the root flag.

Data.Title: HTB-Code
Data.Author: Maxime Delobel
Data.ContentPreview: In Code, we  exploited a Python sandbox to execute code, got a reverse shell, retrieved SSH credentials from the database, and bypassed a backup filter to grab the root flag.

Data.Title: HTB-Nocturnal
Data.Author: Maxime Delobel
Data.ContentPreview: In Nocturnal, we found creds by fuzzing a web application, exploited PHP for database access, cracked hashes for SSH, exploited ISPConfig, and gained root.

Data.Title: THM-Billing
Data.Author: Maxime Delobel
Data.ContentPreview: In THM-Billing, we exploited a MagnusBilling command injection, crafted a reverse shell, abused fail2ban to escalate privileges, added SUID to bash, and gained root access.

Data.Title: THM-BoilerCTF
Data.Author: Maxime Delobel
Data.ContentPreview: In THM-BoilerCTF, we exploited a Joomla command injection for a reverse shell, found SSH creds in logs, pivoted from one user to another, abused SUID, and gained root access.

Data.Title: Cheatsheet-SQL-Injection
Data.Author: Maxime Delobel
Data.ContentPreview: Cheatsheet covering the fundamentals of SQL Injection.

Data.Title: THM-BreakMe
Data.Author: Maxime Delobel
Data.ContentPreview: In BreakMe, we exploited a WordPress vulnerability, leveraged a TOCTOU race condition for lateral privilege escalation, and bypassed a Python sandbox to ultimately achieve root access.

Data.Title: Cheatsheet-Command-Injection
Data.Author: Maxime Delobel
Data.ContentPreview: These cheatsheets serve as my personal quick reference. Therefore, they’re less organized than the box walkthroughs, but I’ve shared them in case others find them useful.
